div.p: For more information on Family service information for the Clyde-Green Springs Schools students and parents please click on the link below.

li.a: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
City of Clyde COVID-19 Repsonse Plan (PDF)

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;
touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.p: First off, thank you for your patience during this process. Being in an unprecedented situation, we are learning as we go and what we can do to make this process easier for everyone involved. We apologize, but we are asking parents to re-submit their meal requests at this time. After one week of this process, we have learned a lot and having you re-submit your requests will allow us to streamline our process, reduce waste, and, best of all, serve your kids the meals you request.

p.strong: AT THIS TIME, WE WILL USE YOUR CURRENT INFORMATION FOR THE WEEK OF MARCH 30 - APRIL 3. HOWEVER, TO CONTINUE TO RECEIVE MEALS STARTING APRIL 6 YOU MUST RE-SIGNUP USING THIS NEW FORM.

div.p: Please head to the Family Meal Plan and re-submit your request (you need to submit only one time - once you are signed up you will remain signed up). Requests need to be submitted by Sunday night at 5 pm to start receiving your food on Monday and Wednesday night at 5 pm to receive you meals starting on Thursday.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.p: In an effort to support the students of the Clyde-Green Springs Schools we have come up with a plan for Chromebook repair. As of March 23rd, 2020 and until further notice we will be allowing students and parents to drop off Chromebooks at Clyde High School for repair. The drop off location will be near the staff parking lot on Limerick near the tennis courts (see blue pin drop on map below). Repair times will be Monday and Thursday from 11:00am-12:30pm until further notice.
